Reference

All functions

assert_character_param()

Allows character vectors

assert_date_param()

Allows a vector of date_like params: date, character, or integer-like

assert_integerish_param()

Allows integer-like vectors

assert_timeset_param()

Allows a timeset param: a date vector, a character vector, an integer-like vector, or a single EpiRange

covid_hosp_facility()

Fetch COVID hospitalization data for specific facilities

covid_hosp_facility_lookup()

Fetch COVID hospitalization facility identifiers

covid_hosp_state_timeseries()

Fetch COVID Hospitalization Data by State

covidcast()

Fetch covidcast data

covidcast_epidata()

creates the covidcast epidata helper

covidcast_meta()

Fetch covidcast metadata

delphi()

Fetch Delphi's ILINet forecasts

dengue_nowcast()

Fetch Delphi's PAHO Dengue nowcast

do_request()

performs the request

ecdc_ili()

Fetch ECDC data

create_epidata_call() fetch_tbl() fetch_classic() fetch_csv() fetch_json() request_url() with_base_url()

An abstraction that holds information needed to make an epidata request

epidatr

Delphi Epidata

epirange()

builds a new EpiRange instances

flusurv()

Fetch FluSurv hospitalization data

fluview()

Fetch FluView data

fluview_clinical()

Fetch FluView virological data from clinical labs

fluview_meta()

Fetch FluView metadata

get_auth_key()

Get the API key

gft()

Fetch Google Flu Trends data

kcdc_ili()

Fetch KCDC data

meta()

Fetch api metadata

nidss_dengue()

Fetch NIDSS dengue data

nidss_flu()

Fetch NIDSS flu data

nowcast()

Fetch Delphi's ILI nowcast

paho_dengue()

Fetch PAHO Dengue

parse_api_week()

parses a week

parse_signal()

fetch covidcast data

pvt_afhsb()

Fetch AFHSB data (point data, no min/max)

pvt_cdc()

Fetch CDC page hits

pvt_dengue_sensors()

Fetch Delphi's digital surveillance sensors for dengue in PAHO member countries

pvt_ght()

Fetch Google Health Trends data

pvt_meta_afhsb()

Fetch AFHSB metadata

pvt_meta_norostat()

Fetch NoroSTAT metadata

pvt_norostat()

Fetch NoroSTAT data (point data, no min/max)

pvt_quidel()

Fetch Quidel COVID-19 and influenza testing data

pvt_sensors()

Fetch Delphi's digital surveillance sensors

pvt_twitter()

Fetch HealthTweets data

timeset

timeset

wiki()

Fetch Wikipedia access data
